document.full_text: australian prime minister julia gillard on tuesday pressed china on human rights and north korea, while seeking to boost trade with her nation's biggest buyer of coal and iron ore.
document.title: australia's gillard woos china and presses on human rights
lines_and_colors: australian prime minister julia gillard on tuesday pressed china on human rights and north korea, while seeking to boost trade with her nation's biggest buyer of coal and iron ore.
